name: Jonk Piraten A.s.b.l.
goal: We are a youth politics organization aiming to get the youth to better understand the political system, both national and international.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
We are a youth politics organization aiming to get the youth to better understand the political system, both national and international.

We organize EU Youth meetings revolving around freedom of expression.
